subject: Tracking Number Request
description_text:
Hi ! I placed an order under the phone number 3365881277 I was wondering if I could get the tracking number.

-Best regards, Harvey
Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

conversations.body_text: Hi Harvey Lanier,  Could you please provide the order date and amount? I’ll help you look it up.

Hi, I placed the order on Saturday the 13th and my total was $138.90

-Best regards, Harvey
Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Hi Harvey Lanier,  If you ordered the H-pattern and sequential 2-in-1 shifter, the shipment has been delayed and is scheduled to be dispatched on the 20th. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Okay I appreciate you getting back to me. Will I be provided with a tracking number once it ships?

-Best regards, Harvey
Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Hi Harvey Lanier,  Yes, once the order is shipped, we will upload the tracking number to the system. May I ask if you provided an email address when placing the order?

No I did not provide an email address just a phone number.

-Best regards, Harvey
Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Hi there just wanted to follow up and see where my order is. I was told it would be dispatched on the 20th and I still have not heard anything.

-Best regards, Harvey
Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Hi Harvey Lanier,    Apologies, the new shifter orders will be dispatched throughout this week.
